channel.title: CVE Feed for Codeboxr Team -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Codeboxr Team -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-32577|2024-04-18T09:33:27.684Z -- Codeboxr Team -- CBX Bookmark & Favorite
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Codeboxr Team CBX Bookmark & Favorite cbxwpbookmark allows Stored XSS.This issue affects CBX Bookmark & Favorite: from n/a through 1.7.20.

item.title: CVE-2024-32132|2024-04-15T07:34:12.849Z -- Codeboxr Team -- CBX Bookmark & Favorite
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Codeboxr Team CBX Bookmark & Favorite.This issue affects CBX Bookmark & Favorite: from n/a through 1.7.20.
